item.title: Due to a BONK Finance Company announcement, SHOT's stock price surged 9.65% in pre-market trading.
item.description: On August 11th, based on rockflow data, the US-listed company Safety Shot (SHOT) announced the launch of the BONK Treasury Strategy, resulting in a 9.65% increase in SHOT's pre-market trading. The company's current market value is reported to be $164 million.According to HTX market data, BONK surged by more than 3% in a short period and is currently priced at $0.00002688.BlockBeats previously reported that the US-listed company Safety Shot (NASDAQ: SHOT) announced a strategic alliance with the BONK founding contributor and officially entered the decentralized finance (DeFi) field. According to the agreement, the company will receive $25 million worth of BONK tokens and issue preferred shares convertible to common stock with a total value of $35 million.

item.title: Binance Earn will undergo a BFUSD upgrade to enhance user experience
item.description: August 11th. According to official information, Binance Finance announced an upgrade to BFUSD in order to enhance the user experience. Commencing at 08:00 on August 14th, 2025 (UTC+8), users will no longer be required to possess a futures account and can directly subscribe to and redeem BFUSD through Binance Finance.To facilitate this upgrade, all user subscriptions and redemptions between 13:00 and 22:00 on August 13th, 2025 (UTC+8) may be impacted. To ensure the smoothness of user transactions, please refrain from performing subscription and redemption operations during the upgrade. Users currently holding BFUSD in futures accounts can transfer BFUSD to spot accounts for redemption. Starting from 08:00 on August 14th, 2025 (UTC+8), users will no longer be able to subscribe to and redeem BFUSD through Binance Futures.

item.title: US publicly traded company Safety Shot announced that it will launch the BONK Treasury Strategy
item.description: On August 11th, as per stocktitan, the US-listed company Safety Shot (Nasdaq: SHOT) announced a strategic alliance with a founding contributor of BONK and officially entered the field of Decentralized Finance (DeFi). Under the terms of the agreement, the company will receive $25 million worth of BONK tokens and will issue preferred shares convertible into common stock with a total value of $35 million in exchange.This enterprise, which has $15 million in cash and has paid off all its debts, chose BONK as its financial strategy target mainly considering the token's competitive advantages. Built on the Solana blockchain, BONK has high-speed transaction capabilities and a deflationary tokenomics model. Currently, it has a market capitalization exceeding $2 billion and 980,000 on-chain holders.

item.title: New ETH Treasury Company 180 Life Sciences Stock Price Up 4.84% in Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 11th, based on rockflow data, possibly due to funding news, the stock price of the new ETH Treasury company 180 Life Sciences (ATNF) surged by 4.84% in pre-market trading.180 Life Sciences (Nasdaq: ATNF) successfully completed a $425 million private funding round to support its Ethereum Treasury strategy. This funding round was led by Electric Capital and Harbour Island, with the participation of well-known cryptocurrency investment firms such as Borderless Capital and Polychain Capital.

item.title: Chainlink Partners with NYSE Parent Company ICE to Bring Forex and Precious Metals Pricing Data On-chain
item.description: On August 11th, as per official information, Chainlink has entered into a partnership with Intercontinental Exchange (ICE), which is the parent company of the New York Stock Exchange. The purpose of this partnership is to bring forex and precious metals pricing data onto the blockchain network.This partnership will incorporate ICE's Global Consolidated Feed into Chainlink's Data Streams. The data source encompasses market data from more than 300 global exchanges and trading platforms and currently serves over 2,000 on-chain applications, financial institutions, and infrastructure providers.Officials stated that by integrating ICE data, Chainlink aims to provide pricing data streams that meet the precision and latency requirements of traditional capital markets. This standard is anticipated to support the development of a new generation of tokenized assets, automated settlement systems, and other institutional-grade blockchain applications. item.title: 180 Life Sciences Completes $425 Million Private Financing to Launch ETH Treasury Strategy, Plans to Raise Additional $150 Million
item.description: On August 11th, according to stocktitan, 180 Life Sciences (NASDAQ: ATNF) has successfully completed a private placement worth $425 million to implement its Ethereum Treasury Strategy. The PIPE (Private Investment in Public Equity) transaction was priced at $2.65 per share. This round of financing is led by Electric Capital and Harbour Island, with the participation of well-known cryptocurrency investment institutions such as Borderless Capital and Polychain Capital.The company intends to use the raised funds mainly to purchase Ethereum (ETH) and launch an income-generating program managed by Electric Capital. This program will seek returns beyond traditional ETH staking by using a combination of strategies including staking, lending, and providing liquidity. item.title: US Stock SharpLink Announces New $400 Million Funding Round to Further Increase ETH Holdings
item.description: On August 11th, according to official channels, SharpLink Gaming, Inc. (Nasdaq: SBET) announced today that it has entered into a securities purchase agreement with five of the world's top institutional investors. Through a registered direct offering, it has successfully raised $400 million. As of August 10, 2025, the company holds approximately 598,800 Ether (ETH), and in addition, it has an unallocated approximately $200 million ATM financing facility. The total estimated value of its ETH holdings is expected to exceed $3 billion.SharpLink Co-CEO Joseph Chalom said: "The nearly $900 million raised in the past week validates the market's confidence in our Ethereum treasury strategy. item.title: Trump Media & Technology Group Submits Amended Version of Bitcoin Spot ETF S-1 Filing
item.description: On August 11th, according to a report by businessinsider, Trump Media and Technology Group Corp. under Trump, Inc. (stock code: DJT) announced today that it has submitted the first amended S-1 registration statement for the Truth Social Bitcoin ETF to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This ETF will directly hold Bitcoin with the aim of tracking the price performance of Bitcoin, and its shares are expected to be listed on the NYSE Arca exchange. The following are other details:· Custody and Liquidity Support: Crypto.com, a cryptocurrency exchange platform, will act as the exclusive Bitcoin custodian, primary executing broker, and liquidity provider.· Sponsor: Yorkville U.S. Digital Corp. will serve as the ETF sponsor.· Approval Process: The launch of the ETF is subject to the SEC declaring the registration statement effective and approving the Form 19b-4 application.

item.title: Strategy increased its Bitcoin holdings by 155 coins last week

The average cost per coin is approximately $73,288.
